function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Implicit order of variables impacting analysis approach","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of covid-19 influence on wtp for green roofs","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited understanding of variable interaction in covid-19 context","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Access to green areas during and after confinement","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Willingness to pay for green roofs","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of economic crisis resulting from covid-19 pandemic","category":"Wealth production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and support for green roof implementation","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprecedented demand for iot solutions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of iot-based technologies for covid-19 management","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment and operation of iot devices for covid-19 management","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot data for decision-making","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 through iot devices and technologies","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wearable devices for monitoring patients and potential inaccuracies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overreliance on iot technology may lead to a lack of human judgment and intervention in critical healthcare decisions.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 through person-to-person contact","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Varying success rates of policies based on location, density, and cultural practices.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People not following covid-19 protocols such as maintaining six feet distance and other health protocols","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological difficulty in making people follow the protocols","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact of a complete lockdown creates pressure to design and build resilient public spaces to withstand future pandemics.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in public transportation usage leading to increased use of private vehicles","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in online shopping leading to reduced physical footfall in retail spaces","category":"Shopping","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on online shopping as a result of in-person shopping limitations","category":"Shopping","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between average income, age group, and virus transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of stay-at-home orders in neighborhoods without public or private open spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in income and class can lead to unequal access to safe public spaces and increased vulnerability to contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased immunity due to physical inactivity and social distancing measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to enforce public norms and regulations in heavily dense urban areas","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological aversion to big crowds and necessary changes in public spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High exposure to and sharing of fake news in specific population sub-sections","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control on the spreading of false content due to social dynamics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Healthcare system miscommunication leading to inaccurate understanding of epidemic seriousness and required resources","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public misunderstanding of epidemic complexity and risk analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate information conveyed from government to the public","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevated risk perception influenced by media attention and social media discourse","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and truthfulness of information perceived","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Communication challenges in effectively informing the public","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to accurate information leading to misinformation and panic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cybersecurity breaches leading to dissemination of false information","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drastic reduction in air traffic due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Transport","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in testing techniques and accuracy of results","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai and ml in predicting infection spreading rates and diagnosing diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying solely on online information from verified sources may lead to incomplete or biased understanding of the
